channel.title: Helen Dragas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Hoo d'etat
item.description: From UVA Today: June 26, 2012 â€” The University of Virginia Board of Visitors today voted unanimously to reinstate Teresa A. Sullivan as president. University Rector Helen E. Dragas apologized for actions that sparked the controversy and pledged that she will work with Sullivan to capture the energy from the events of the past three weeks to address the issues confronting the University. The University of Virginia Libraries is documenting this turn in the power struggle at UVA, which saw Sullivan ousted from her post by the Board of Visitors.
